name: Mr. Soren

conversation.response_text: Ms. Van Graff, my associates and I have decided that we wish to renegotiate the terms of our deal.
W-What is this, Ms. Van Graff?

description:
Mr. Soren is a 52 year-old Caucasian Male.

Mr. Soren is a middle-aged businessman found in the Silver Rush in New Vegas. He is having an argument with Gloria Van Graff regarding a weapons payment dispute. During the confrontation, he protests about the quality of weapons delivered to him and his associates.

Mr. Soren's Personality: Mr. Soren is pragmatic and assertive in business matters, not easily intimidated despite dangerous circumstances. He demonstrates courage by standing his ground against the Van Graffs, though wisely chooses to flee when the situation escalates.

Mr. Soren's Backstory: Mr. Soren was once associated with the Van Graff family, working as an arms dealer in the Mojave Wasteland. However, over time, he became an independent businessman who still occasionally dealt with the Van Graffs. By 2281, he had established himself as a reputable arms dealer, though his relationship with the Van Graffs had become strained due to business disputes.
